popup.description1: Keep in mind that the commissions to carry out any transaction must be paid in RBTC, therefore you must convert your BTC to RBTC in order to use Tropykus.

deposit.description4: Write the amount you are going to
deposit.description6: See how much you can earn with your deposit in the period of time you choose

borrow-repay.description1: Write the amount you are going to

borrow.description5: By default, all your deposits are
borrow.description6: used as collateral to make a

repay.tooltip1: The value corresponds to the amount
repay.tooltip3: acumulados hasta la fecha de pago.

loading.title1: Confirming the transaction on the network

btc-rbtc.title: How to convert my BTC to rBTC
btc-rbtc.subtitle3: Transfer your funds to your Liquality wallet
btc-rbtc.subtitle4: Copy the destination address to receive your Bitcoins
btc-rbtc.subtitle8: Receive your BTC and save at Tropykus

binance.title: Transfer your funds from
binance.subtitle2: Login to Binance with your account
binance.subtitle3: Press the option “Wallet“ located in the upper right corner and select the option “Fiat and spot“
binance.subtitle4: Look for the “Withdraw“ option that appears on the right side of the “Bitcoin“ menu.
binance.subtitle5: Select the Bitcoin network and copy and paste your Bitcoin address from your Liquality wallet.
binance.subtitle6: Write the amount of BTC you want to withdraw

ledn.title: Transfer your BTC from
ledn.subtitle2: Login to ledn with your account
ledn.subtitle3: Press the option “Wallet“ located in the upper right corner and select the option “Fiat and spot“
ledn.subtitle4: Look for the “Withdraw“ option that appears on the right side of the “Bitcoin“ menu.

blockfi.title: Transfer your BTC from
blockfi.subtitle2: Login to Poloniex with your account
blockfi.subtitle3: Go to the “Balances“ menu in the upper right corner and select the “Deposits & Withdrawals“ option
blockfi.subtitle4: Select the “Hide 0 Balances” option and then click on the “Withdraw” option
blockfi.subtitle5: Enter the amount of BTC you want to withdraw and the liquality address to which you want to send the funds. Then press “Withdraw“ and voila, you can now save and borrow at Tropykus
